attributes.additional_details: So everyone can provide for them selves.
attributes.background: Give nurses a better raise to help them provide for their families.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase NHS Staff pay by 10%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610647

If you would like the Government to increase nurses pay by a particular amount, you could start a new petition requesting this.
